code: import{copyToClipboard}from'../utils/clipboard';import{useToast}from'./useToast';export const useClipboard=()=>{const{showCopyToast}=useToast();const copyTextToClipboard=async function(text){let successMessage=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:'복사되었습니다';const success=await copyToClipboard(text);if(success){showCopyToast(successMessage);}else{showCopyToast('복사에 실패했습니다');}return success;};const handleCopyMessage=async messageContent=>{return copyTextToClipboard(messageContent,'메시지가 복사되었습니다');};return{copyTextToClipboard,handleCopyMessage};};
